# Packages

library(tidyverse)
# for more plots
library(ggalt) # needs installing `proj` library on your system!

# Data

```{r}
cumulative_data <- read_csv('data/ita_vaccinations_cumulative.csv') %>%
  mutate(area = as.factor(area))

cumulative_data

cumulative_data %>%
  filter(area != 'ITA') %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = vaccinazioni_eseguite,
    xend = dosi_consegnate,
    y = area
  )) +
  geom_dumbbell(
    # dot_guide = T, dot_guide_size = 0.15,
    colour="#a3c4dc", size=1.5, colour_xend="#0e668b"
  ) +
  theme_fivethirtyeight()
```
